column1: #Text=[0001] This is a continuation of International Application No.
#Text=PCT/EP2003/013705 filed Dec. 4, 2003, the entire disclosure of which is hereby incorporated herein by reference.
#Text=[0003] The invention relates to a method for separating whole blood into a leukocyte-depleted erythrocyte concentrate and plasma, and to a device for carrying out this method.
#Text=[0005] In whole-blood separation, whole blood taken from blood donors is separated into the individual blood components.
#Text=These are principally erythrocyte concentrates or plasma fractions which may be cell-free or contain thrombocytes.
